preInstallNotes:
This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Preview packages should never be used in production! In order for MariaDB service to start successfully it requires atleast 1 CPU and 1024MB of RAM including ports.

postUninstallNotes: MariaDB has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to a NFS share still exists and will need to be manually removed.
